content.text: Hey, I'm a huge Ender's Game fan! What did you think of the last book?
Hello, me too! I loved the whole series, but I thought the ending was a bit too rushed.
I agree, it could have been more fleshed out. I'm trying to find some other books to read that are similar.
Have you read anything by Orson Scott Card? He's the author of Ender's Game.
I haven't, but I've heard good things about his books. What are some of your favorites?
I really like the Homecoming series. It's about a group of people who are sent back in time to Earth after it's been destroyed.
That sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good series.
What are some of your other interests?
I like to rollerblade, go to farmer's markets, and try new foods.
Oh, that sounds fun! I've always wanted to try rollerblading.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely give it a try.
I think I will. Thanks for the suggestion!
